column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I do most of the grocery shopping for my family , I really enjoy buying food .
#text=I went to the grocery and started with the produce section .
#text=It 's pleasant to see all the fresh greenery and ripe fruit on display .
#text=I picked out a bunch of asparagus and a bag of Minneola oranges .
#text=Then I moved on to the bread section where I chose a loaf of wheat bread and a French baguette .
#text=I was out of olive oil from cooking rigatoni last week , so I went to the oil section .
#text=Luckily they had my favorite brand , Frantoia .
#text=I selected a bottle and went on .
#text=During the rest of the trip , i bought meat , cereal , milk , eggs , freezer bags and other items .
#text=When I was finished i went to the cashier and had my purchases rung up .
#text=I handed the cashier a 50 dollar bill , and received change of $ 6.75 .
#text=My grocery shopping was finished for the day .
